newsitem.title: USA: Arthur J. Gallagher acquires UK firm.
newsitem.headline: Arthur J. Gallagher acquires UK firm.

text.p: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co said Tuesday it has acquired Morgan, Read & Coleman Ltd, a London-based reinsurance firm for undisclosed terms.

Morgan, Read & Coleman Ltd was formed in 1976 and has been owned by current management since 1990. It provides services in the United Kingdom, North America, the Caribbean and Australia. Its current staff of 64 employees will operate under the name of Gallagher, Read & Coleman Ltd, and will continue under the direction of Brian King.

John Stancik, chairman of Arthur J. Gallagher (UK) Ltd, said, "This partnership with Morgan, Read & Coleman Ltd gives us the opportunity to enhance our presence in London, to show our continued support and commitment to the European marketplace, and to follow our strategic plan to strengthen our global presence."
